name: PseudonymizationIG
title: Implementation Guide MII Schnittstelle Pseudonymisierung
description: Implementation Guide f√ºr einheitliche Schnittstelle Pseudonymisierung in der MII

resource.name: anonymize-originals
resource.description: Anonymises a given list of 1-n original values within the specified domain. The reference of original value and pseudonym is permanently and irreversibly deleted.

resource.name: de-pseudonymize
resource.description: Returns the original value for a given pseudonym.

resource.name: delete-pseudonyms
resource.description: Deletes a given list of 1-n entries (identified by the original value) in the specified domain, if the configuration of this domain allows this.

resource.name: DePseudonymizeRequestWithStringExample
resource.description: An example of a $de-pseudonymize request using a pseudonym value of type string

resource.name: DePseudonymizeResponseWithStringExample
resource.description: An example of a $de-pseudonymize request response

resource.name: Parameters-AnonymizeOriginals-request-example-1
resource.description: An example of a $anonymize-originals request using a original value of type string

resource.name: Parameters-AnonymizeOriginals-response-example-1
resource.description: An example of a $anonymize-originals request response

resource.name: Parameters-DeletePseudonyms-request-example-1
resource.description: An example of a $delete-pseudonyms request using two original values of type string

resource.name: Parameters-DeletePseudonyms-response-example-1
resource.description: An example of a $delete-pseudonyms request response

resource.name: Parameters-PseudonymizeSecondary-request-example-1
resource.description: An example of a $anonymizepseudonymize-secondary request of type string

resource.name: Parameters-PseudonymizeSecondary-response-example-1
resource.description: An example of a $anonymizepseudonymize-secondary request response

resource.name: pseudonymize
resource.description: Generates a pseudonym for the given original value.

resource.name: pseudonymize-example-bundle-batch-request
resource.description: An example batch bundle to create multiple pseudonyms

resource.name: pseudonymize-example-bundle-batch-response
resource.description: An example response bundle for the pseudonymize batch request

resource.name: pseudonymize-secondary
resource.description: Generation of a specific number of pseudonyms in an existing pseudonymisation context with simultaneous assignment to the given original value.

resource.name: PseudonymizeRequestWithIdentifierExample
resource.description: An example of a $pseudonymize request using an original value of type identifier

resource.name: PseudonymizeRequestWithStringExample
resource.description: An example of a $pseudonymize request using an original value of type string

resource.name: PseudonymizeResponseExample
resource.description: An example of a response to a $pseudonymize request
